A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Huge let-down. Disney's not catering to the fans who have been invested in this universe that's now growing increasingly shallow in terms of backstory and believability. Snoke and the apparently nonexistent(?!) Knights of Ren are a couple of examples; I am angrily starting to not care about all of this film's characters. How can I\, when I don't even know anything about them! This movie is so frustrating!!! Disappointment\, Disney! :(
